meaning_str.bing:
adj. 美味的；可口的；好吃的；喷香的
网络. 美味书签；美味可口的

美味的；可口的；好吃的；喷香的

美味的；可口的；芬芳的；味道极佳的；赏心悦目的；宜人的；诱人的；令人愉悦的；令人开心的

sogou-kaoyan.adj: 美味的[出现0次)];令人愉快的[出现0次)]

sogou-CET6.adj: 美味的; 芳香的[出现8次)]

sogou-CET4.adj: 美味的; 芳香的[出现10次)]

sogou-gaokao.adj: 美味的; 芳香的[出现6次)]

sogou-zhongkao.adj: 美味的; 芳香的[出现97次)]

1.en: He said "I recalled how, during the summer, my older brother and I used to cool it off by pouring in cold milk, and how delicious it was. "
1.cn: 他说：“我记得在夏天，我和哥哥是怎样把凉牛奶倒入汤里让它冷下来的，我也记得这种汤的味道有多好。”

2.en: Ordering something that will reheat easily will provide you with a delicious lunch or dinner the next day.
2.cn: 购买一种可以容易再加热的可口午餐或晚餐，留待第二天食用。

3.en: Yogurt is not just a delicious snack with fruits on the bottom, it has great health benefits.
3.cn: 酸奶不仅仅是一种有水果沉淀于其中的美味可口的零食，它还对健康有很大的益处。

0.en: I want you to make me a delicious salad.
0.cn: 我想让你帮我做些美味的沙拉。

1.en: Everything smells so delicious. You know, I can't remember the time I ever smelled such a delicious combination of, okay, smells.
1.cn: 味道好香，我早已忘记这种美味的香味。

2.en: Look at these delicious fruits! That makes me feel so good.
2.cn: 看看这些美味的水果！让我感觉棒棒哒。

3.en: You should try this, this is the most delicious part, you know.
3.cn: 你应该试试这个，这是最美味的部分。

4.en: I'm going to serve up a little bit of the rice. Some of this delicious sauce.
4.cn: 我要盛一点炒饭出来，加上点儿美味的酱汁。

5.en: This into a bowl, and I'm just going to create a delicious marinade for the chicken.
5.cn: 将鸡肉放进碗里，接下来我要做一点美味的酱汁来腌制鸡肉。

6.en: Let me cut you a piece of the salmon. No, thank you. I'm stuffed. It's the most delicious thing on the boat.
6.cn: 我来给你切块三文鱼。不用了，谢谢，我撑死了。这是船上最美味的食物了。

7.en: Well, that's all there is of these, but in about eight and a half minutes, we'll serve some delicious onion tartlets.
7.cn: 只有这一些，但再过8分半钟，我们就会献上美味的洋葱馅饼。

8.en: It's sweet and sour pork in buns. It's going to be gorgeous and sticky and delicious. I'm going to make the marinade.
8.cn: 咕噜肉汉堡，将会异常美味的。现在我要做调味酱汁。

9.en: Make sure the delicious sauce just coats all the noodles and the crab, and then add in the coriander and the spring onions.
9.cn: 确保美味的酱汁包裹每一根的面条和螃蟹，然后加入香菜和葱。

10.en: So for that I've got a few tablespoons of ketchup, and it is surprising to use ketchup but it's this delicious sweetness that I want.
10.cn: 为此我需要几汤匙蕃茄酱，用蕃茄酱很怪异，但我就需要它那种美味的甜味。

11.en: So that I'm going to keep for decoration. We want to crack the claw. So that's going to allow all the delicious juices to soak into the meat.
11.cn: 那个我要留着做装饰。把爪子敲断，这样美味的酱汁就会渗入肉里。

12.en: OK, come for a moment, cos I have to show you, this is how I'm going to make my radish cucumber salad, OK, with plenty of delicious soy sesame dressing.
12.cn: 过来一下，我来展示给你如何制作我的独门萝卜黄瓜沙拉，里面加了美味的酱油和麻油酱汁。

13.en: Is it okay that I still think it looks delicious?
13.cn: 啊，没事，我还是认为很好吃。

14.en: This is delicious. Where'd you learn to make chili?
14.cn: 真好吃，你这辣椒汤在哪儿学的？

15.en: Aw! Poor man. So trusting, so fragile, so delicious.
15.cn: 啊！可怜的人类，如此轻信，如此脆弱，如此美味。

16.en: One, two, three, hoopla! Mm! Delicious! Silly Daddy.
16.cn: 一、二、三，哗，嗯！太美味了！笨爸爸！

17.en: This delicious, authentic hot and sour, Suan La Tang.
17.cn: 美味可口，原汁原味的酸辣汤。

18.en: Amy, that pudding was delicious. If you like raisins.
18.cn: 艾米，这果干布丁真好吃，如果你喜欢葡萄干的话。

19.en: Well done, Peppa, Peppa has found the picnic. Delicious.
19.cn: 干得好，佩奇！佩奇找到了午餐。真好吃。
